title: While playing league my fps drops and lags for a second or 2 then jumps back up and to normal
body:
Any ideas? ive switch my video card my system is brand new. no idea why it is doing this. 

i7 6700 
1070 rog strix oc video card 
16 gigs ddr04 ram 
z170 mother board 

should be running league no problem dont know why im getting spikes where my fps drops. happened with my old video card too *( while waiting for my 1070) its not my internet either.

replies.body:
Issues with frame skips and jumps can be caused by a plethora of factors. Typical causes are problematic video drivers, corrupted game assets and power settings inside windows. A good place to start troubleshooting this is by working through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it offers the most comprehensive list of common solutions. 

Should you still see FPS issues, get back to me about this.

One of my friends was having this issue, I reset some power settings and changed graphics quality as the FPS troubleshoot said, the problem still persisted. For her PC, turning on Anti-aliasing actually fixed the problem. The guide says to turn it off, you may want to try leaving it on and try that.

KP ~ Hope I Helped
